sentences.en: A central portion of a city, between uptown and downtown.
sentences.cn: 市中心的大部分建筑物都拆掉了, 建起了新的房子.

sentences.en: All they every do is go uptown and mess around.
sentences.cn: 所有他们所做的事就只是围着镇子走来走去.

sentences.en: But after a while, they move uptown, into the formal economy.
sentences.cn: 但是不久，他们就搬进住宅区，成为正式经济的一部分。

sentences.en: Every Friday, I trek uptown with Audrey to see a child life specialist.
sentences.cn: 每周五，我都要很辛苦地带着奥德丽去住宅区看儿童生活专家。
他在住宅区租了一间公寓.

sentences.en: He rode uptown and made his way to Bob's apartment.
sentences.cn: 他乘车前往城外鲍勃的公寓。

sentences.en: He took his way across the park and headed uptown.
sentences.cn: 他穿过公园向住宅区走去.

sentences.en: New uptown is nearby the high way.
sentences.cn: 新住宅区紧挨高速公路.

sentences.en: Personnel Officer: Wanna work uptown nights ? South Bronx ? Harlem?
sentences.cn: 官员: 你夜里要去住宅区吗——南布朗克斯——黑人区?

sentences.en: Remember, the number 1 train. The uptown platform.
sentences.cn: 记住, 搭一路车, 在北月台.

sentences.en: She loves to uptown also. And this is our favorite teen shop.
sentences.cn: 她也很喜欢逛街,最喜欢逛这家青少年服装店.

sentences.en: She went to the uptown post office.
Take the uptown A train and off at the next station.
sentences.cn: 坐往北去的A线车,坐一站就下车.

sentences.en: They live in an apartment uptown.
sentences.cn: 他们住在市郊的一套公寓。

sentences.en: Where can I transfer to the uptown express?
sentences.cn: 我在哪里换车到上城区快车?

sentences.en: You take the uptown R train and get off at 42 nd street.
sentences.cn: 您乘北线方向的R路车到第42街下车.

trans.tran_en: in or towards an area of a city that is away from the centre, especially one where the streets have larger numbers in their names and where people have more money
